features: Advanced Therapy Lotion: High performing hand and body lotion instantly hydrates, softens and heals dry skin without harsh chemicals leaving skin silky soft and smooth.
Daily Moisturizing Lotion: Non-greasy, lightweight formula penetrates deep into skin to provide immediate, all-day hydration for radiant, healthy-looking skin.
Allergen-Free Body Lotion: Dermatologist-tested with zero sulfates, parabens, phosphates, artificial colors, additives or fragrances. Ideal for anyone with sensitive skin or odor sensitivities.
Cruelty-Free Body Care: Ginger Lily Farms is PETA-certified cruelty-free and vegan. Our products are never tested on animals so you can feel good using them.
Economical & Eco-Friendly: Gallon refill size helps reduce plastic consumption and is perfect for refilling lotion dispensers in locker rooms, hotels, spas or at home. 1 Gallon (128 fl. oz.)
body.description: ZeroDerm 24 Hour Advanced Therapy Daily Moisture Lotion was developed and formulated for people that want a high-performing hand & body lotion that is clean, healthy and contains zero ingredients that can cause skin irritations. ZeroDerm was developed and formulated for people that want high-performing personal care products that are clean, healthy and contain zero ingredients that can cause skin irritations. Made by Ginger Lily Farms, the leader in refill personal care products, ZeroDerm products are the made with the best ingredients to give you the ultimate shower experience.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ginger Lily Farms is the leader in refill personal care products and is made with the best ingredients to give you natural deliciousness for your body. All products are 100% vegan, cruelty-free and PETA certified (Certification granted on March 28th, 2019). Most contain natural fragrances with no artificial color or dyes. For All Hair and Skin Types; Kid & Adult Friendly Ginger Lily Farms Botanicals ZeroDerm Advanced Therapy Collection Ginger Lily Farms Botanicals ZeroDerm Advanced Therapy Products were developed and formulated for individuals that want high-performing personal care products that are clean, healthy and contain zero ingredients that can cause skin irritations. Formulated without fragrance, sulfates, parabens, phosphates, artificial colors or additives. Allergen-free, kid and adult friendly. ZeroDerm Collection Includes: Body Wash, Body Moisturizer, Shampoo, Hand Soap and Conditioner High-Performing Personal Care Products Contains Zero Ingredients That Cause Skin Irritations Allergen-Free, 100% Vegan Paraben-Free, Sulfate-Free, Fragrance-Free, Phosphate-Free No Artificial Colors or Additives 1-Gallon, 128 fl. oz.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Goes on smoothly. Feels like silk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Lotion is a daily necessity when living in the desert and this lotion does the job! It has a texture like Aveeno, so easy to apply. I dumped some of the lotion from the jug into a jar without any trouble. Not much of a smell to it and no residue left.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Worth every penny I spent. Love the lotion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly thick and rich lotion. Will last for ages.
reviews.reviewText: A gallon of lotion! I wanted this lotion for my super dry skin and also for my husband's very dry hands. I wasn't sure what to expect but I am pleasantly surprised. The lotion is quite thick. I thought it would be watery but it isn't at all. It is creamy and hydrating. There is no scent so my husband feels more comfortable using it than my scented lotions. I wish it came with a pump top so we could pump some out whenever we needed it. I bought some pump bottles though and am filling those so I will have a bottle in almost every room of the house and in my RV to keep my skin hydrated.Its simple but effective moisturizing lotion. It lasts for around six hours before my skin starts to feel dry again. I use a thick body butter after a shower and this lotion as often as I can between to keep my skin plumped and hydrated. I tried it on my face and it works great! No scent, no stickiness, and it hydrated nicely. I wouldn't use it as my daily facial moisturizer but it's quite effective. I removed a star because it doesn't last quite as long as I would like on my skin and I wish it came with a pump top but, in all, this is a great buy and will last for ages!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best fragrance free lotion I've found
reviews.reviewText: I have tried dozens of supposedly fragrance free lotions. This is by far the best. No scent, no smell at all. Rich, creamy texture that absorbs just right. Skin stays soft a long time. Does not seem to me a massage lotion because it is nicely thick. Not too thick, but luxuriously so. And a great value. I just hope it is as free of bad ingredients as it claims. Very happy with this lotion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Worth the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good so far
reviews.reviewText: Unscented and fragrance free as advertised, works about as well as any other lotion. No excessively sticky feeling left on your skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really good lotion! I’ll buy it again!
reviews.reviewText: This lotion is just the right consistency, not too thick or thin. It lasts a long time on your skin and was a great price! I love how big the bottle is so I don’t have to buy it frequently but I will definitely buy it again. I would recommend buying a pump though.
